title: Our coaching trip,
author: Carnegie, Andrew
snippet: Looking  back down the valley of Lake Ericht, we had the ideal Highland view — mountains everywhere fading into blue in the distance, green to their tops except when capped with snow, and bare, not a tree nor a 17

title: Our coaching trip,
author: Carnegie, Andrew
snippet: It was gloaming ere we reached Lake Ericht, twelve hundred and fifty feet above the sea, and entered  the queer little inn at Dalwhinnie.

title: Our coaching trip,
author: Carnegie, Andrew
snippet: It was gloaming ere we reached Lake Ericht,twelve hundred and fifty feet above the sea, and entered the queer little inn at Dalwhinnie, A brightfire was made, and we were as gay as 'larks at dinner, I am sure nothing could surprise Araericansmore than the dinners and meals generaUy whichwere given us even in such out-of-the-way stationsas this.
